question: Which of the following is not a coordinating conjunction?
Correlative conjunctions always work in pairs.
Which of the following is a pair of correlative conjunctions?
Fill in the blank with the correct subordinating conjunction: _____ it was raining, we decided to stay indoors.
Fill in the blank with the correct coordinating conjunction: I wanted to go to the beach, _____ it was too cold.
Identify the highlighted conjunction used in this sentence: 'When the bell rings, we'll leave the classroom.'
Which of the following is not a correlative conjunction pair?
Fill in the blank with the correct correlative conjunction: _____ we go to the movies _____ we stay home, we'll have fun.
Which conjunction is used to show contrast?
'For' is a coordinating conjunction.
Which type of conjunction is used in this sentence: 'Not only did she win the race, but also she set a new record.'?
Fill in the blank with the correct subordinating conjunction: We'll go to the park _____ it stops raining.
Which of the following is a coordinating conjunction?
Subordinating conjunctions always come at the beginning of a sentence.
Fill in the blank with the correct coordinating conjunction: I like apples _____ oranges.
Which type of conjunction is used in this sentence: 'She studied hard, so she passed the test.'?
'Whether...or' is a pair of correlative conjunctions.
Which of the following is not a subordinating conjunction?
Fill in the blank with the correct correlative conjunction: _____ the red shirt _____ the blue one looks good on you.
Which type of conjunction is used in this sentence: 'I'll bring either a cake or some cookies to the party.'?
Fill in the blank with the correct subordinating conjunction: _____ she was tired, she finished her homework.
Which of the following is a coordinating conjunction?
Fill in the blank with the correct coordinating conjunction: It was late, _____ we decided to go home.
Which type of conjunction is used in this sentence: 'Neither the cat nor the dog wanted to take a bath.'?
Fill in the blank with the correct subordinating conjunction: _____ it was raining, we decided to stay indoors.
